1.title: THE GRAND CHRONICLES (Vol. I)
1.plot: A rupture within the Earth causes Lucas to seek out Grand Gentleman Wade's help. Lucas soon learns that he, too, is a Grand Gentleman. On their way down to the core, they encounter new dimensions and realities.

2.title: THE GRAND CHRONICLES (Vol. II)
2.plot: Grand Gentleman Grimwade receives some "body modification" surgery, turning him into the ultimate killing machine. Afterwards, Grand Gentleman Wade realizes that he has lost his jacket. Of course, he can not go on like this, so with the help of Sanjeev the intergalactic uber driver, the two Grand Gentleman go on a quest to find the lost jacket.

3.title: THE GRAND CHRONICLES (Vol. III)
3.plot: With Grand Gentleman Grimwade trapped in The Void, Grand Gentleman Wade seeks out help from a forgotten, third Grand Gentleman named Grand Gentleman McGrew. Master Wade senses a dark energy approaching, and doesn't know who to trust.

4.title: THE GRAND CHRONICLES (Vol. IV)
4.plot:

imdb.plot outline: A huge rupture in the Earth's core causes Grand Gentleman Grimwade to seek help from (master) Grand Gentleman Wade. On their way down to the core, they face many encounters within new dimensions and realities. Little do they know, a darker force is arising; breaching a dimension we know as our common world. Will the Grand Gentleman be victorious in their quest to defeat all evil?
imdb.title: The Grand Chronicles
plot: A huge rupture in the Earth's core causes Grand Gentleman Grimwade to seek help from (master) Grand Gentleman Wade. On their way down to the core, they face many encounters within new dimensions and realities. Little do they know, a darker force is arising; breaching a dimension we know as our common world. Will the Grand Gentleman be victorious in their quest to defeat all evil?

After experiencing a rupture in the Earth's crust, Grand Gentleman Grimwade seeks out Master Grand Gentleman Wade for answers. The two travel to the Earth's core to find out what the problem is, while experiencing all kinds of different dimensions and realities along the way. Eventually, the two Grand Gentleman discover that the cause of this rupture is the the result of a larger, dark force breaching this world we commonly know as Earth. Will they be able to protect this world from the oncoming evil, or fall helpless underneath its power?
